title: Amaenbo
description:
1. Mousou Sweater
2. Onna Enbo
3. My Girl
4. Yanushi no Josei
5. Araizuma (The Wash Wife)
6. Anedere
7. Yukemuri Girl
8. Step Up Joshiryoku
9. Omimai Kanojo
10. Elevator no Josei
11. Osoizuma (Let's Rape the Husband) [spoiler]
The husband has been working overtime lately and the wife has been feeling lonely, so she takes it upon herself to take what she wants from her husband and claiming it to be a psychological phenomena. High sexual content, nice vanilla romance. [/spoiler]
12. Shinkan no Susume
13. Amayadori (Woman Sheltering) [spoiler]
The story is about the girlfriend of a best friend, they just broke up and she has no where to go, so she goes to the house of her ex-boyfriend's friend and asks if she can stay there since she has nowhere to go; then, of course, sexual exploits occur, but sad moments as well [/spoiler]
